text: kavurun tama deviyangē (śuddha vū kurānaya namæti) pæhædili dænuma labā ættehuda ovunda, ovunṭa deviyan visin (īsāṭa) pahaḷa karanu læbū dæya (injīl) sākṣiyak vaśayen ættēda ovunda, tavada ovunṭa meyaṭa pera pahaḷa karanu læbū mūsāgē dharmaya ek mārgōpadēśayak vaśayenda, varaprasādayak vaśayenda ættēda ovunda, anivāyadæyenma mema dharmayada viśvāsa karanu æta. (ovun venuven vū phalavipākaya nam svargayayi). mema pārśavayan (tunen) kavurun meya pratikṣēpa kaḷā vuvada, ovunṭa porondu dena lada sthānaya nirayayi. ebævin (nabiyē!) oba mehi poḍiyak hō sækayak æti kara noganu. niyata vaśayenma meya obagē deviyan visin pahaḷa karana lada satya (dharmaya)yi! ehet minisungen bohomayak denā (meya) viśvāsa karannē næta
